title: Chattahoochee River National Recreation Area: Reptiles
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Nature     Animals     Reptiles                Reptiles       The Chattahoochee River National Recreation Area is home to over 40 species of reptiles. You may spot the turtle sunning on a log or miss the snake as it hides in the leaf litter. For a list of reptiles found in the park visit the NPSpecies page. Make sure you select Chattahoochee River National Recreation Area (CHAT) and Reptiles in the drop down menus before clicking on the Search button. Once the list appears click on the Report/PDF button to print out a Species Checklist for the park.
